description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Drafting layouts, elevations, and construction details for residential remodeling
              
              projects. This will often include on-site measuring and site inspections;
              

              - Can use software like Autocad.
              

              - Can make presentation for client (Powerpoint).
              

              - Used to work for Japanese constructor is an advantages.
              

              - Must use English. Can speak Japanese is an advantage.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Degree in Civil Engineering, Architectural or Construction Management;
              

              - Good knowledge of concerned regulations in building construction field;
              

              - Proactive thinking, creative, hard working, willing to work overtime.
              

              - Friendly, honest, loyal, enthusiastic.
              

              - Used to work for Japanese constructor is an advantages.
              

              - Must use English. Can speak Japanese is an advantage.
              

              AGE: 25-29.
              

              * Benefits;
              
              - Benefits and incentives following Labour Code and Social Insurance Laws
              
              - Work in an active and professional environment
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc

Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
